summary: After she is raped and her husband murdered, a woman hires a bounty hunter to instruct her in the use of a gun so she can get her revenge on the three outlaws responsible.
cast: Raquel Welch|Robert Culp|Ernest Borgnine|Jack Elam|Strother Martin|Christopher Lee|Diana Dors|Florencio Amarilla|Luis Barboo|Stephen Boyd|Paco de Luc√≠a|Brian Lightburn|Elmer Modlin|Aldo Sambrell|Juan Manuel Torres
title: Ana Caulder
